statements: DELETE FROM WeatherConditions WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND precipitation >= 5.0;
DELETE FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature < 10 AND precipitation > 2.5;
DELETE FROM WeatherConditions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND impact_on_farming = 'Heavy Frost';
DELETE FROM climate_conditions WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60;
DELETE FROM farming_activities WHERE activity_type = 'planting' AND date <= '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM WeatherImpact WHERE impact_description LIKE '%rain%';
DELETE FROM FarmingActivities WHERE activity_name = 'Planting' AND activity_start < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM WeatherConditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50
DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
